displayName.japanese: 空から舞い降りた少女

description.japanese: ゲームを始めた。
11歳になった。
12歳になった。
13歳になった。
14歳になった。
15歳になった。
16歳になった。
17歳になった。

description.english: Your daughter talked to the Gatekeeper.
description.japanese: 門番と話した。

description.english: Your daughter talked to the Imperial Guard Knight.
description.japanese: 近衛騎士と話した。

description.english: Your daughter talked to the General.
description.japanese: 将軍と話した。

description.english: Your daughter talked to the Minister.
description.japanese: 大臣と話した。

description.english: Your daughter talked to the Bishop.
description.japanese: 司教と話した。

description.english: Your daughter talked to the Favorite Mistress.
description.japanese: 寵姫と話した。

description.english: Your daughter talked to the Queen.
description.japanese: 王妃と話した。

description.english: Your daughter talked to the King.
description.japanese: 国王と話した。

description.english: Your daughter talked to the Clown.
description.japanese: 道化師と話した。

description.english: Your daughter talked to the Young Military Officer.
description.japanese: 青年武官と話した。

description.english: Cube rescued your daughter during errantry.
description.koreana: 무사수행 중에 쓰러져 큐브에게 업혀 돌아왔다.
description.schinese: 武士修行中晕倒，被邱普背回家
description.tchinese: 武士修行中暈倒，被邱普背回家
description.japanese: 武者修行中に倒れてキューブと一緒に帰った。

description.english: Your daughter won the gold prize in Art Festival.
description.japanese: 芸術祭で優勝した。

description.english: Your daughter won the championship in Combat Tournament.
description.japanese: 武闘会で優勝した。

description.english: Your daughter won the 1st place in Cooking Contest.
description.japanese: お料理コンクールで優勝した。

description.english: Your daughter won the 1st place in Dance Contest.
description.japanese: ダンスパーティーで優勝した。

description.english: Your daughter did a perfect job at Housework.
description.schinese: 出色的完成了家务打工
description.tchinese: 出色的完成了家務打工
description.japanese: 家の手伝を無難にこなした。

displayName.japanese: 上手なベビーシッター

description.english: Your daughter did a perfect job as Babysittier.
description.schinese: 出色的完成了保姆打工
description.tchinese: 出色的完成了保姆打工
description.japanese: 子守のアルバイトを無事に終えた。

description.english: Your daughter did a perfect job at Inn.
description.schinese: 出色的完成了旅馆打工
description.tchinese: 出色的完成了旅館打工
description.japanese: 宿屋のアルバイトをちゃんとこなした。

description.english: Your daughter did a perfect job at Farm.
description.schinese: 出色的完成了农场打工
description.tchinese: 出色的完成了農場打工
description.japanese: 農作業のアルバイトをちゃんとこなした。

description.english: Your daughter did a perfect job at Church.
description.schinese: 出色的完成了教会打工
description.tchinese: 出色的完成了教會打工
description.japanese: 教会で奉仕活動を無事に終えた。

description.english: Your daughter did a perfect job at Restaurant.
description.schinese: 出色的完成了饭馆打工
description.tchinese: 出色的完成了飯館打工
description.japanese: 料理屋のアルバイトを上手にこなした。

displayName.english: I'm a lumberjack and I'm okay

description.english: Your daughter did a perfect job as Lumberjack.
description.schinese: 出色的完成了樵夫打工
description.tchinese: 出色的完成了樵夫打工
description.japanese: 木コリのアルバイトを頑張り抜いた。

displayName.japanese: メイクアップアーチスト

description.english: Your daughter did a perfect job as Hairdresser.
description.schinese: 出色的完成了美容院打工
description.tchinese: 出色的完成了美容院打工
description.japanese: 髪結いのアルバイトをうまくこなした。

description.english: Your daughter did a perfect job as Plasterer.
description.schinese: 出色的完成了理发店打工
description.tchinese: 出色的完成了理發店打工

description.english: Your daughter did a perfect job as Hunter.

description.tchinese: 出色的完成了獵人打工
description.japanese: 狩人のアルバイトを失敗せずにすんだ。

displayName.english: In the night I keep it good

description.english: Your daughter did a perfect job as Gravekeeper.
description.schinese: 出色的完成了守墓人打工
description.tchinese: 出色的完成了守墓人打工
description.japanese: 墓守のアルバイトを平穏無事に終えた。

description.english: Your daughter did a perfect job as Tutor.
description.japanese: 家庭教師のアルバイトを完璧に終えた。

description.english: Your daughter did a perfect job at Bar.
description.schinese: 出色的完成了酒馆打工
description.tchinese: 出色的完成了酒館打工
description.japanese: 酒場のアルバイトをよく働いた。

description.english: Your daughter did a perfect job at Illegal bar.
description.schinese: 出色的完成了「地下酒馆」的打工
description.tchinese: 出色的完成了「地下酒館」的打工
description.japanese: ヤミ酒場のアルバイトを無事に済ませた。

description.english: Your daughter did a perfect job at Cabaret.
description.schinese: 出色的完成了「夜之殿堂」的打工
description.tchinese: 出色的完成了「夜之殿堂」的打工
description.japanese: 夜の殿堂のアルバイトをうまくやりとげた。

displayName.japanese: おたくの娘さんは将来…

description.english: Had heard the future from a fortune teller.
description.japanese: 旅の占い師から将来の姿を見た。

displayName.japanese: 珍しい宝物がいっぱい

description.english: Bought an item from a travelling trader.
description.schinese: 向途经的商人购买了物品
description.tchinese: 向途經的商人購買了物品
description.japanese: 旅の行商人から商品を購入した。

description.schinese: 与武神的战斗中获得胜利
description.tchinese: 與武神的戰鬥中獲得勝利
description.japanese: 武神との戦いで勝利した。

displayName.japanese: 老ドラゴンとの出会い

description.english: Your daughter met an old dragon.
description.japanese: 老ドラゴンと出会った。

description.english: Your daughter met the Demon Lord.
description.japanese: 魔王と出会った。

description.english: Gave Demon Pendant to a demon.
description.japanese: 悪魔のペンダントを渡した。

description.english: Gave Fairy Egg to spring fairy.
description.schinese: 将精灵蛋送给湖之精灵
description.tchinese: 將精靈蛋送給湖之精靈
description.japanese: 泉の精霊に卵を返した。

displayName.english: Meet Ket Shi, the God of wildcats
displayName.japanese: ケット・シーと出会った

description.english: Gave Cat's Eye to Ket Shi.
description.japanese: 猫の眼石を返した。

description.english: Gave a birthday present to your daughter.
description.japanese: 娘の誕生日にプレゼントをくれた。

description.english: Your daughter came down with illness.
description.japanese: 娘が病気で倒れた。

description.english: Yout daughter grew into an adult.
description.japanese: 娘を無事成長させた。
キューブと結婚した。

description.english: Your daughter married to a dragon.
description.japanese: ドラゴンと結婚した。

description.japanese: 魔王と結婚した。

娘がサギ師になった。
娘が街娼になった。

description.english: Become a Lord of the Darkness
description.japanese: 娘が魔王になった。

displayName.japanese: 背が高いのがコンプレックス

description.english: Your daughter is at least 165cm tall.
description.japanese: 娘の背が165cmを超えた。

description.english: Your daughter's bust measures at least 96cm.
description.japanese: 娘のサイズが96cmを超えた。

description.english: Your 18-year-old daughter is less than 152cm tall.
description.koreana: 딸의 키가 152cm를 넘지 않는 상태로 18세가 되었다.
description.schinese: 女儿的身高未超过152cm的状态下到了18岁
description.tchinese: 女兒的身高未超過152cm的狀態下到了18歲
description.japanese: 娘の背が152cmを超えないまま18歳になった。

description.english: Your daughter is overweight by a margin of 20%.
description.japanese: 娘の体重が増えすぎた。
スタミナが最大になった。
色気が最大になった。
モラルが最大になった。
因業が最大になった。

description.english: Your daughter has at least 125 Attack.
description.japanese: 娘の攻撃力が125を超えた。

description.english: Your daughter has at least 125 Magic Attack.
description.schinese: 女儿的魔法攻击力超过了200
description.tchinese: 女兒的魔法攻擊力超過了200
description.japanese: 娘の魔法攻撃力が125を超えた。

description.english: Your daughter has at least 200 in every reputation.
description.japanese: 娘の全ての評価が200を超えた。

description.english: Your daughter has at least 300 in every reputation.
description.japanese: 娘の全ての評価が300を超えた。

description.english: Your daughter has at least 400 in every reputation.
description.japanese: 娘の全ての評価が400を超えた。

description.english: Your daughter has at least 500 in every reputation.
description.japanese: 娘の全ての評価が500を超えた。

description.english: Defeated the bandit in the Eastern forest.
description.schinese: 击到了东部森林地带的悬赏犯
description.tchinese: 擊到了東部森林地帶的懸賞犯
description.japanese: 東部・森林地帯の賞金首を倒した。

description.english: Defeated the bandit in the Southern lake.
description.schinese: 击倒了南部瀑布地带的悬赏犯
description.tchinese: 擊倒了南部瀑布地帶的懸賞犯
description.japanese: 南部・水郷地帯の賞金首を倒した。

displayName.japanese: カスティーヨを倒した

description.english: Defeated the bandit in the Northern glacier. (Also rename this place from 'iceberg'.)
description.schinese: 击倒了北部冰山地带的悬赏犯
description.tchinese: 擊倒了北部冰山地帶的懸賞犯
description.japanese: 北部・氷山地帯の賞金首を倒した。

description.english: Your daughter upheld the honor of the fencing dojo.
description.japanese: 道場破壊犯をたおした。

description.english: Your daughter freed the wayward soul from the graveyard.
description.japanese: 墓場の騎士を倒した。

description.english: Your daughter chose not to duel in the streets.
description.japanese: 街の決闘を断った。

displayName.japanese: 結婚なんて考えた事ないわ

description.english: Your daughter declined an unsavory advance because of how much you mean to her. (From either the old cheating man or the sleazy blonde man)
description.japanese: 結婚要請を断った。

description.english: Approve the marriage proposal of a random suitor.
description.japanese: 結婚要請を承諾した。

description.english: Sold your daughter's Morality to the smarmy demon.
description.schinese: 将女儿的品德出售给了恶魔
description.tchinese: 將女兒的品德出售給了惡魔
description.japanese: 悪魔に娘のモラルを売った。

description.english: Your daughter was arrested for highway robbery.
description.japanese: 娘が逮捕された。

description.english: Your daughter won the ultimate respect of the kitchen demon.
description.japanese: 精霊ドモヴォイの祝福を受けた。
description.schinese: 得到了精灵哆摩布伊的祝福
description.tchinese: 得到了精靈哆摩布伊的祝福

description.english: Your daughter won the ultimate respect of the socialite demon.
description.schinese: 得到了魔神派蒙的祝福
description.tchinese: 得到了魔神派蒙的祝福
description.japanese: 魔神パイモンの祝福を受けた。

description.english: Your daughter won the ultimate respect of the goddess of war.
description.schinese: 得到了瓦尔基丽娅的祝福
description.tchinese: 得到了瓦爾基麗婭的祝福
description.japanese: ワルキュレーの祝福を受けた。

description.english: Your daughter won the ultimate respect of the greatest sorceress.
description.schinese: 得到了大魔法师小菲的祝福
description.tchinese: 得到了大魔法師小菲的祝福
description.japanese: 大魔法使いフェイの祝福を受けた。
人魚と会って人魚の涙をお見せした。
極楽鳥玉を孵化させた。

description.english: Return the unicorn horn to its resting place.
description.japanese: ユニコーンに角笛を返してくれた。

description.english: Sacrifice your combat skill for the elf's blessing.
description.koreana: 엘프에게 전투 기술을 나누어주고 축복을 받았다.
description.schinese: 与灵树分享了战斗技巧，得到了祝福
description.tchinese: 與靈樹分享了戰鬥技巧，得到了祝福
description.japanese: エルフに戦闘技術を渡して祝福を受けた。

description.english: Find the fairies' dance party. (Either one)
description.japanese: 妖精たちの舞踏会を見つけた。

description.english: Find the fairies' tea party. (Either one)
description.japanese: 妖精たちのお茶の会を見つけた。

displayName.english: I Think He Was Wearing That

description.english: Confiscate the prized possession of the demons.
description.japanese: 魔王に信仰を売った。
